revised_title: Molecular Structure and Reactions of Azobenzol and Benzidine
tldr: This article discusses the history, molecular structure, and chemical reactions of azobenzol and benzidine. The author conducts experiments to determine the molecular weight of azobenzol and the molecular construction of benzidine. The author also explores the reactions of benzidine with ethyl iodide and the formation of various compounds, including diethylbenzidine and tetraethylbenzidine.
